text: Just got my very first, first author publication. All of my stats were done in Julia. Thanks guys!

text: I didn’t want to use this topic for shameless promotion, so sharing the link in this thread if you are interested in neuroscience <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuropharm.2021.108479>.

attachments.title: Caffeine exposure in utero is associated with structural brain alterations and deleterious neurocognitive outcomes in 9-10 year old children
attachments.text: Caffeine, a very widely used and potent neuromodulator, easily crosses the placental barrier, but relatively little is known about the long-term impac…
